pullrequest.title: Update plugins to use either 28 or 30 joints

content.raw:
I have a couple changes in branch [drcsim_4.2_atlas_v5_plugin_standpose](#!/osrf/drcsim/branch/drcsim_4.2_v5_plugin_standpose). I caught a few messages that had arrays of size 28 and changed them to 30. I also changed reverted the PID standing pose back to John's fix in [v3_v4_stand](#!/osrf/drcsim/branch/v3_v4_stand) branch. Still can't get the shaky arms to go away, so I strongly suspect the problem is in AtlasSimInterface. If others think the changes are acceptable, I'll merge them in.

I also tried changing the enums in AtlasState.msg to match the v5 joint names, but it didn't fix anything, so I reverted those changes.
content.html:
I have a couple changes in branch drcsim_4.2_atlas_v5_plugin_standpose. I caught a few messages that had arrays of size 28 and changed them to 30. I also changed reverted the PID standing pose back to John's fix in v3_v4_stand branch. Still can't get the shaky arms to go away, so I strongly suspect the problem is in AtlasSimInterface. If others think the changes are acceptable, I'll merge them in.

I also tried changing the enums in AtlasState.msg to match the v5 joint names, but it didn't fix anything, so I reverted those changes.
